features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication using Supabase Auth with email/password login, session management, and JWT tokens

features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
features.description: Comprehensive RBAC system with 6 user roles (admin, monev, viewer, program_planner, program_implementer, carbon_specialist) and permission checking functions

features.name: Dashboard Nasional
features.description: Main dashboard displaying aggregate statistics including total PS count, total area, RKPS status, map status, and kabupaten-level statistics

features.name: Data PS Management
features.description: Data table for managing Perhutanan Sosial records with filtering, searching, and pagination capabilities

features.name: PS Profile Detail
features.description: Detailed profile page for individual PS records with multiple tabs: Ringkasan, Kelembagaan, Dokumen, Peta, Galeri, Kegiatan, Catatan

features.name: Excel Import System
features.description: Excel file upload, parsing, and import functionality for bulk data import with validation and error handling

features.name: Kabupaten Management
features.description: Kabupaten-level data management with detailed statistics, filtering, and navigation to individual kabupaten pages

features.name: Internationalization (i18n)
features.description: Multi-language support for Bahasa Indonesia and Chinese Traditional using next-intl with language switching

features.name: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: Statistics and analytics dashboard with charts and visualizations for data analysis

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User profile viewing and editing functionality with validation

features.name: Carbon Projects Management
features.description: Carbon project management module for carbon specialists and admins

features.name: Programs Management
features.description: Program management functionality for program planners

features.name: Potensi Data Management
features.description: Potential data management for tracking potential forest areas

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS including buttons, cards, tables, inputs, dropdowns, tabs, and more

features.name: Dashboard Layout Components
features.description: Dashboard layout components including header, sidebar navigation, and data table

features.name: Supabase Client Integration
features.description: Supabase client setup for both browser and server-side operations with authentication and database queries

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for PS data structures and enums

features.name: API Routes
features.description: Next.js API routes for server-side operations including Excel import
